version_description:
All-new Retina Graphics - we've made sure everything looks amazing on all of your devices!

Universal support for iPad, iPhone 5 and iPod Touch!

Finding new Characters and Power Ups is way easier in the all-new 'Boosts' menu!

Beautiful

This latest update improves performance and stability.

Keep jumping!
